Introduction
This topic contains rating considerations for convalescent benefits under 38 CFR 4.30, including
determining the effective date of convalescent ratings
convalescence for disabilities with common secondary etiology
extension of convalescent ratings
requesting future examinations
, and
post-convalescence evaluations and 38 CFR 3.105(e)
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section C - Convalescent Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.30
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section C
